p: Surprisingly, we did not see any observable difference in the prophylactic efficacy of mice receiving R1a-B6-mIgG2a compared to R1a-B6-mIgG1. This suggested ADCC was not an essential component of the protective mechanism of action of R1a-B6 in this context notwithstanding that the mouse IgG2a isotype version of R1a-B6 was capable of mediating ADCC ( Figure 4E).
